snippet.title: Bloodhound SSC: How do you build a car capable of 1,000mph?
snippet.description: ...Human beings achieved many 'firsts' in the 20th century. We climbed the planet's highest mountains, dived its deepest undersea trench, flew over it faster than the speed of sound, and even escaped it altogether in order to visit the moon.
